name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781901
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Building Blocks & Bricks
title: LEGO Star Wars: The Mandalorian's N-1 Starfighter Building Set 75325
description: Build the iconic N-1 Starfighter from The Book of Boba Fett with this detailed LEGO set. Includes minifigures of The Mandalorian with a darksaber, Peli Motto with a wrench, plus BD Droid and Grogu figures. Features a minifigure cockpit, passenger space for Grogu, a cargo compartment, a spring-loaded shooter and lots of authentic bashed-up details.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781902
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Fashion Dolls
Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Collectible Dolls
title: Dream Dazzlers Glamour Stylist Fashion Doll - Chloe
description: Meet Chloe, the ultimate fashion stylist! This 11.5-inch Dream Dazzlers doll comes with a chic outfit, stylish accessories, and a hairbrush to create amazing looks. With articulated limbs, Chloe is ready to strike a pose. Collect all the Dream Dazzlers dolls for endless fashion fun!

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781903
categories: Learning & STEM > Early Development Toys > Shape Sorters & Stacking Toys
title: Fisher-Price Rock-a-Stack and Baby's First Blocks Bundle
description: A classic toy bundle for little ones! The Rock-a-Stack features five colorful rings to grasp, shake, and stack. Baby's First Blocks offer 10 colorful blocks to sort, stack & drop through the openings in the bucket lid. This set helps develop hand-eye coordination and problem-solving skills.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781904
categories: Arts & Crafts > Craft Kits > Slime & Putty Kits
Arts & Crafts > Modeling & Sculpting > Modeling Clay & Dough
title: Crayola Ooey Gooey Slime Making Kit, 3 Colors
description: Mix up a batch of colorful, gooey fun with the Crayola Ooey Gooey Slime Kit! This kit includes everything you need to create three vibrant batches of slime with no measuring and no mess. Just mix the included powders with water and shake! Includes 3 shakers, 3 slime powder packets, and instructions. Non-toxic and kid-safe.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781905
categories: Toys & Games > Plush & Stuffed Animals > Interactive Stuffed Animals
title: FurReal Friends Cubby, the Curious Bear Interactive Plush Toy
description: Cubby, the Curious Bear, is a dream companion for kids ages 4 and up! He's an interactive plush toy who loves to play during the day and cuddle at night. He can move his head, eyes, ears, nose, mouth, and arms, and makes lots of fun sounds. Comes with a 3-in-1 accessory: a bottle, a treat, and a comb.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781906
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Battery-Powered Ride-Ons
title: Power Wheels Jurassic World Dino Racer, 12V Battery-Powered Ride-On ATV
description: Young racers can ride into exciting 'off-road' adventures with the Jurassic World Dino Racer! This battery-powered ride-on features awesome Dino-inspired graphics and styling, a sturdy steel frame, and a high-performance Power-Lock brake system. It drives on hard surfaces and grass at 3 and 6 mph forward, and 3 mph in reverse. Includes a 12-volt battery and charger.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781907
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Science Kits & Experiments
title: National Geographic Mega Crystal Growing Lab - 8 Vibrant Colored Crystals
description: Grow amazing crystals in 8 different colors with this deluxe science kit! The National Geographic Mega Crystal Growing Lab includes a night light display stand to show off your five best creations. Learn about crystal chemistry with the full-color learning guide. A fantastic STEM gift for any aspiring geologist.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781908
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Family Board Games
title: Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza Card Game
description: Keep these 5 crazy words in mind. As soon as there is a match between a card and a spoken word, slap your hand on the central pile of cards. The last one to do so must take them all! This addictive game is as unique as its name. It's a power-packed, quick, and simple party game.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781909
categories: Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Superhero Action Figures
Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Collectible Figures
title: DC Comics Batman 12-inch Action Figure, Black Suit
description: Create your own epic superhero and supervillain adventures with the Batman 12-inch Action Figure! This action figure features 11 points of articulation, a cloth cape and detailed comic styling that brings your favorite Batman character to life! Engage your imagination and pose your action figure as you play out your own Batman storylines and battles.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-781910
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Jigsaw Puzzles (By Piece Count)
title: Buffalo Games - Cinque Terre - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Piece together the vibrant and picturesque coastal village of Cinque Terre with this stunning 1000-piece jigsaw puzzle from Buffalo Games. Made from premium quality materials, this puzzle features a full-color poster to help with solving. Every Buffalo Games jigsaw puzzle is manufactured from recycled puzzle board.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LEGO_75388
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Building Blocks & Bricks
title: LEGO Starship Voyager Construction Set
description: Embark on an intergalactic adventure with the LEGO Starship Voyager construction set. This highly detailed 842-piece set features an opening cockpit, deployable landing gear, and spring-loaded shooters. Includes 4 minifigures: a brave captain, a loyal android, and two alien adversaries. Perfect for Star Wars fans and LEGO builders alike, this set provides hours of creative play and makes an impressive display piece.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_MTL_HJV37
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Dollhouses & Furniture
title: Barbie Celebration Dreamhouse with Elevator & Pool Slide
description: Discover a world of possibilities with the Barbie Celebration Dreamhouse! Standing over 3 feet tall and 4 feet wide, this deluxe dollhouse features 3 stories, 8 rooms, a working elevator, a home office, a carport, and a pool with a slide. Lights and sounds add a realistic touch to playtime. Includes 70+ accessories to decorate and furnish the house. Dolls not included.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_HSB_F0954
categories: Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Superhero Action Figures
title: Marvel Legends Series 6-Inch Collectible Spider-Man Action Figure
description: With over 80 years of entertainment history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters are designed with premium detail and articulation for posing and display in collections. This 6-inch-scale Spider-Man figure features premium design, detail, and multiple points of articulation, and is a great addition to any action figure collection. Includes 2 alternate hands and a web accessory.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_FP_HJP18
categories: Learning & STEM > Educational Toys > Learning Laptops & Tablets
Learning & STEM > Early Development Toys > Infant Sensory Toys
title: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Tablet
description: Introduce your baby to the world of learning with the Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Tablet. This interactive toy tablet features Smart Stages technology that lets you change the learning content as your baby grows! Every baby develops at their own pace, and Smart Stages gives you the ability to select the stage that’s best for your child. There are a variety of developmentally appropriate songs, phrases and sounds within three levels of play.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_HW_GTT72
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Race Tracks & Playsets
title: Hot Wheels Criss Cross Crash Track Set, 4-Way Motorized Booster
description: Crank up the competition with this awesome Hot Wheels Criss Cross Crash track set! With more than 16 feet of track that includes hairpin turns, motorized boosters and a giant crash zone, kids can enjoy crash-and-bash fun for hours on end. Includes one Hot Wheels vehicle. Connects to other Hot Wheels track sets for building an epic world of racing.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_CRYL_541216
categories: Arts & Crafts > Drawing & Painting > Crayons, Markers & Pencils
Arts & Crafts > Craft Kits > Sand Art & Painting Kits
title: Crayola Inspiration Art Case, 140 Pieces
description: Unleash your creativity with the Crayola Inspiration Art Case. This all-in-one portable art studio has everything a young artist needs to create. The set includes 64 crayons, 20 short colored pencils, 40 washable markers, and 15 large sheets of paper, all neatly packed in a convenient and durable travel case. The snap-fit trays keep all the art supplies organized and accessible.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_RF_1800
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Wagons
title: Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon
description: The classic wagon with a modern twist. The Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon features a sturdy steel body, real wood sides, and rugged 10-inch air tires for a smooth ride on any terrain. The extra-long handle folds under for easy storage, and the controlled turning radius prevents tipping. Perfect for hauling toys, trips to the park, or just a stroll around the neighborhood.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_HSB_F1259
categories: Arts & Crafts > Modeling & Sculpting > Modeling Clay & Dough
title: Play-Doh Kitchen Creations Busy Chef's Restaurant Playset
description: It's time to cook up some fun! The Play-Doh Kitchen Creations Busy Chef's Restaurant Playset lets kids feel like they're running their own restaurant as they create, customize, and share amazing Play-Doh food creations. The double-sided playset features a kitchen and customer seating. Stamp out pizza, burgers, pasta, and chicken with the various molds, then use the topping station to decorate. Includes 5 cans of Play-Doh modeling compound.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_SCH_14587
categories: Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Animal & Dinosaur Figures
title: Schleich Tyrannosaurus Rex Dinosaur Figure
description: The Tyrannosaurus Rex is one of the most recognizable dinosaurs. This impressive figure from Schleich is hand-painted with intricate detail, bringing the 'King of the Tyrant Lizards' to life. Featuring an articulated jaw that opens and closes, this durable figure is perfect for educational play and for collectors. Discover the prehistoric world with Schleich!

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_RAV_16772
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Jigsaw Puzzles (By Piece Count)
title: Ravensburger "Oceanic Wonders" 3000-Piece Jigsaw Puzzle for Adults
description: Dive into a breathtaking underwater scene with the Ravensburger Oceanic Wonders 3000-piece jigsaw puzzle. Our puzzles are crafted with premium quality, using exclusive, extra-thick cardboard combined with our fine, linen-structured paper to create a glare-free puzzle image for a quality you can see and feel. Softclick Technology guarantees a perfect interlocking fit. A wonderful challenge for avid puzzlers.
